懕懕懕
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

懕字的基本解释

懕
yān
同“恹”。

懕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yān］
［《廣韻》一鹽切，平鹽，影。］
同“厭4”。
(1)安详。
(2)懒倦，精神不振。参见“懕懕”。
[②]［yàn］
［《集韻》於豔切，去豔，影。］
同“厭2”。
(1)厌恶。
(2)满足。
(3)心服。

懕字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懕； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页406第18
【廣韻】一鹽切【集韻】於鹽切【韻會】幺鹽切【正韻】衣鹽切，?音㤿。【說文】安也。从心厭聲。　又通作厭。【詩·小雅】厭厭夜飮。【說文】引《詩》作懕。【朱註】厭厭，安也，亦久也。蓋飮酒之久，將醉而有安詳之容也。　又【集韻】於豔切，音?。足也。或省作厭猒。　又【集韻】益涉切，音魘。心可也。

懕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懕字的起名意思

暂无。

懕
Basic explanation of words
懕
yān
Same as "恹".
懕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yān］
["Guangyun" a salt cut, flat salt, shadow. ]
Same as "disgusting 4".
(1) Serenity.
(2) Laziness and lack of energy. See "Liulu".
[②]［yàn］
["Ji Yun" Yu Yan cut, go to Yan, shadow. ]
Same as "Disgust 2".
(1) Disgust.
(2) Satisfaction.
(3) Be convinced.
懕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懕; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 406 Page 18
[Guangyun] One salt cut [Jiyun] Yuyan cut [Yunhui] Yaoyan cut [Zhengyun] Yiyan cut,? Yin 㤿. [Said Wen] An Ye. Tired from the heart.　It's getting bored again. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Satisfied with night food. [Said Wen] Quoting "Poetry" for 懕. [Zhu Note] I'm tired of it, and it's a long time. The wine will be drunk for a long time, and there will be a peaceful face.　[Jiyun] Yu Yanqie, sound?. Foot also. Or save it for being bored.　[Jiyun] Yisheqie, sound nightmare. The heart can be.
